pp.description: Gamifying the World Health Organization's guidelines on #safehands with a Spatial Interactive Learning Experience. Keep yourself and your family safe, play this now at g3d.in/safehands  Top the leader-board, get rewarded. Powered by GMetri.
pp.project_start_description:
#safehands
An interactive game to learn WHO's Hand-Wash guidelines.
pp.title: Safehands - A Virtual Reality Game for Clean Hands

viewer_form_fields.heading: Let us know enough to get in touch if you win.

ep.ssml: Step 2: Apply enough soap to cover all hand surfaces

<speak>
Step 3 
For clean palm.
<break time="600ms"/>
For clean fingers 
<break time="600ms"/>
And for clean finger tips
</speak>

<speak>
Step 5: Dry hands thoroughly with a single use towel
<break time="2s"/>
use towel to turn off faucet.
</speak>
Congratulations, you have successfully learned how to wash your hands properly.
There are 5 steps to having clean, hygenic and germ-free hands. Click the numbers step-by-step.

ep.element_name: oh no 1 stitch as 2 seconds clips

ep.ssml: Select all the right ways to rub your hands
Congratulations, you have successfully learned how to wash your hands properly.

Select the right order in which you need to wash properly to stay safe. 

Selecting the wrong options will result in a negative score.
